category.name: Manufacturing

preference.name: PertChart.AutoSizeMode
preference.preference_description: Enables or disables auto-size in the PERT chart. When auto-size is off, the size of the all newly created PERT nodes is uniform. When auto-size is on, the size of the newly created PERT nodes is automatically fitted to the displayed text, including allowing for multiple lines. Valid Values: yes - Enables auto-size. no - Disables auto-size.
